description:
After missing Day 1, Nicki Blue shows up begging for a second chance and the other trainees allow her to have one. To get this second chance she will have to prove to me that she deserves it. She is tied and put on display for the other trainees to watch as I put her through intense torment and humiliation.
It is apparent that the other girls are intimidated by what they see, and all decide to walk away from the training except for one other. The training begins early and the final two start to learn what lies ahead of them.
title: Day 2 March Intake
